## ParticleEmitterEventPayloads."PARTICLE\_EMITTER.SET\_LIFETIME\_VARIANCE" property

Emitted when the lifetime variance of an emitted particle is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript

        particleEmitter: ParticleEmitter;
```
